entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 1:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
